title: BrightData Web Fetcher
userSettings: [{"name":"apiKey","label":"BrightData API Key","type":"password","required":true,"description":"Your BrightData API key"},{"name":"serpZone","label":"SERP Zone ID","defaultValue":"serp_api1_web_search","description":"Your SERP API zone ID"},{"name":"unlockerZone","label":"Web Unlocker Zone ID","defaultValue":"web_unlocker1","description":"Your Web Unlocker zone ID"},{"name":"autoEnabled","label":"Enable Automatic Web Fetching","type":"enum","values":["true","false"],"defaultValue":"true","description":"Enable automatic web fetching based on AI instructions"}]
openaiSpec: [{"name":"search_web","description":"Search the web for information using Google search. Use this when the user asks you to search for something, look up information, or find current data about any topic.","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"query":{"type":"string","description":"The search query/question to search for"},"search_type":{"type":"string","enum":["web","news","images","videos","shopping","scholar"],"description":"Type of search: web (general), news (latest news), images, videos, shopping (products), scholar (academic)","default":"web"}},"required":["query"]}},{"name":"fetch_webpage","description":"Fetch and read content from a specific webpage URL. Use this when the user provides a specific URL they want you to read, analyze, or get information from.","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"url":{"type":"string","description":"The complete URL to fetch content from"}},"required":["url"]}}]
